ygData.subject: Re: Arrrgh! I've had it!
ygData.msgSnippet: Lvl 9 is very annoying, the lvl 8 to 12 shot is the worst because you are stuck with the lvl 4 hp sapping spell and others.  Even though vamp embrace has been
ygData.messageBody:
Lvl 9 is very annoying, the lvl 8 to 12 shot is the worst because you are
stuck with the lvl 4 hp sapping spell and others. Even though vamp embrace
has been modified it still isn't all that great. I would suggest you fight
in Nek forest or go to East Commonlands and fight the Lions and Young Kodis.
But stay near the zone and be careful for the griffins. Let me know how it
goes.

I shall consume all that is living and live off of its energy. Death is my
nothing but my follower.

Nino (dunno about surname maybe Nightshade).
Dark Elf lvl 17 Necromancer.
-----Original Message-----
From: johnathan spectre <jspectre@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, May 06, 1999 6:47 PM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Arrrgh! I've had it!


>From: "johnathan spectre" <jspectre@...>
>
>Hello,
>I'm a DE Necro who is frustrated with the 9th level. I've died and lost it
4
>times now and can't seem to get above one bubble of exp before I lose it.
>Hunting
>in the forest seems to be worthless, only an occasional skeleton gives me
any
>exp (or a kodiak if I can find one), the haflings eat me for lunch. I've
been
>to
>east commons a few times but I die as much as I make experience. Befallen
>seems to be too hard (and I die) or too easy (and no exp). Am I doing
>something wrong? Should I be hunting elsewhere? I've about had it with my
>necro character, I've recently started a human mage in Freeport (eech) and
>he's having a much easier time. I don't mind slow going but I like to see
some
>character advancement.
>
>Any suggestions? Any help? I'm about to give up..
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Always wanted to set up a book club, but can't find the time?
>http://www.onelist.com
>Create an online book club through ONElist.
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
>
